name: Duplideath
description:
Duplideath is a game that dyeing in it  gives you a clone that can help you to cross the 9 levels you will be challenged in. The purpose of the game is to beat the 9 levels as fast as you can and as little as possible death count.

Controls :

W,S - Move

D - Dash Down

Space - Jump

LMB - Place Duplicate

Note :

This is my first gamejam and It was fun, I wish luck for all the participants !
